author: IGN.com (podcasts@ign.com)
title: Keepin' It Reel : Keepin' It Reel, Episode 301: Star Wars, Prometheus and Avatar Sequels
text:
Keepin' It Reel, Episode 301: Star Wars, Prometheus and Avatar Sequels 
Welcome back to Keepin' It Reel! In this week's episode of IGN's movies podcast, Jim Vejvoda, Terri Schwartz and Chris Carle bring you some of the latest in genre movie news. 
This week's topics include Marvel's Avengers: Infinity War Parts 1 and 2, Doctor Strange, Star Wars: The Force Awakens, Alien: Paradise Lost, Gambit, Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice, Pacific Rim 2, Avatar 2, SPECTRE, and the live-action Attack on Titan adaptation. 
We also discuss The Martian and Hollywood's track record with Mars movies.
